title: God is One
description:
Readings from:

Deuteronomy 6:4-5

Zechariah 14:9

Romans 3:29-30

1 Corinthians 8:5-6

Ephesians 4:4-6

Today's passages were read by Jeremiah St. James, a Christian radio personality on stations around the country, including his home station KXOJ in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
